thread.title: WPP chief Sorrell investigated over misconduct allegation

title: WPP chief Sorrell investigated over misconduct allegation
text:
WPP chief Sorrell investigated over misconduct allegation 10:54am BST - 00:38 
The world's biggest advertising firm, WPP, is investigating chief executive Martin Sorrell over an allegation of personal misconduct. He denies any wrongdoing. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's biggest advertising firm, WPP, is investigating chief executive Martin Sorrell over an allegation of personal misconduct. He denies any wrongdoing. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2q4cYQi
